title: Oberoi Realty in talks with Marriott International, Hyatt for luxury hotel property in Thane
description: The company is planning to develop a 300-key property as part of its proposed integrated development spread across nearly 75 acres. This will be the first five-star hotel to come up in Thane near the countryâ€™s financial capital Mumbai.
